reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Disaster proofing Indian cities by strengthening delivery of emergency services during climate extremes.

description.narrative: This project will identify additional services/equipment needed to more effectively deliver emergency services during climate extreme events in Indian cities, build capacity of emergency services operators and increase awareness of supply chain companies (including internationally) on specific Indian market needs and opportunities.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
